channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Directs Military to Target Foreign Drug Cartels
item.description: The president has ordered the Pentagon to use the armed forces to carry out what in the past was considered law enforcement.

item.title: Over what does the Trump admin want to unleash 'dominance'? Find out in the quiz
item.description: Plus: physical fitness, Confederate statues, robot overlords and weird zoo requests.

item.title: New Jersey Synagogue Burns to Ground as Rabbi and Family Escape
item.description: Congregation Beth El in Rutherford, more than a century old, was destroyed. The mayor said there was no indication of arson so far.
